extension.name: Maintenance Mode
extension.description: Temporarily close your site for maintenance

releases.release: - Add support for Symphony 2.3 - Update to use `PageManager`, new `Configuration` methods
- Update to use `SYMPHONY_URL` constant (breaks compatibility with Symphony versions prior to 2.2) - Added Romanian translation
- Added page type "maintenance" to the suggestion list - Fixed error handling - Removed empty language files - Updated included translations
